sentence.Network_en: A method of producing crystal sodium fluoride with sodium fluosilicate and sodium carbonate is introduced.
sentence.Network_cn: 本文介绍了以氟硅酸钠、纯碱为原料生产晶体氟化钠的工艺,并对操作条件作了详细的说明.

sentence.Network_en: Compositions, crystallization mechanisms and properties of the fluosilicate glass ceramics were investigated in this paper.
sentence.Network_cn: 本文主要研究了氟硅酸盐微晶玻璃的组成 、 晶化机理和性能三个方面的内容.

sentence.Network_en: The process of preparating potassium fluosilicate from the mother liquor of magnesium fluoride has been studied.
sentence.Network_cn: 研究了以氟化镁母液为原料制取氟硅酸钾的工艺过程,通过试验获得了最佳工艺条件.
